name: NVRWLK
description:
Are you ready to swing?

Swing on the ropes and see how far can you go.
There is no explicit goal in the game. Try going as far as you can or as fast as you can or learn to make precise jumps!

If you fall down or get stuck, restart from the main menu.

Notes:
Do not use the hook button (LMB) while you are on a regular rope. It will make you drop down. It is a bug and will be fixed. Only use the hook button in mid-air when in proximity of a hook point.
There are a few nasty bugs with how hooks behave. They will be fixed in a post-jam update when uploads are unlocked. Among other things, a hook point will falslely visually signify a possible connection if you approach it from above. In actuality, you can only connect to it if you are lower than it is!

Controls:

WASD - Swing, steer
Mouse - Look around
Space - Jump (double jump in mid-air)
LMB - Hook (for big carabiners with orange circles appearing around them. Hold to connect, release to let go)

Gamepad input works too! For XBOX controllers:
Left Thumbstick - Swing, steer
Right Thumbstick - Look around
A - Jump
Right trigger - Hook

Soundtrack on Bandcamp: https://lqfp.bandcamp.com/track/swang-song-nwrwlk-official-ost

Team:
Dito Seregin: https://twitter.com/terzalo
Nick Shikhachevskiy: https://www.instagram.com/lqfp_post/

Third-party attributions are listed on game's credits page.
